description:
A witch, a vampire, and a mummy... From the darkness, Wakasa, Takasu, and Mikuni appear.
When Tatsumi sees Wakasa dressed as a witch, he wonders why. When Mikuni declares, "Trick or Treat," he realizes it`s Halloween, but he tells the trio he has no candy. The watchful trio pounces on Tatsumi with a tickle attack! What will happen to Tatsumi? Will Wakasa and his friends acquire any candy?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Halloween Circumstances of My Household
オレん家のハロウィン事情
